text:
WhyMoolya?

Why Moolya Stays a Preferred Partner to Top Companies

Skin in the Game

We put our skin in our customer's game to the extent that customer vendor relationship fades and deep sense of co-ownership prevails.

Leadership Friendly

Leaders need powerful information to succeed. Moolya consistently empowers C-level, V-level, and D-level executives.

Culture Focus

We believe that the majority of the issues happen due to culture and we support our customers to fix culture.

Scaling Value

Lack of real-time analytics for tracking agent performance and SLA adherence
Story So Far

How we Engage?

Complete Solutions to Anything in Quality Engineering

Project-Based Testing

We collaborate on defined projects to deliver focused, high­quality testing outcomes. Our teams adapt to your workflows, ensuring speed, precision, and real-world impact.

Staffing

We provide skilled testing professionals who seamlessly integrate into your teams. Each expert brings Moolya's mindset context-driven, adaptive, and outcome-focused.

Managed Testing

We take end-to-end ownership of your testing operations and quality goals. Our managed model ensures consistency, transparency, and continuous improvement.

Advisory & Consulting

We help organizations shape testing strategies and mature their quality practices. Our consulting blends strategic insight with hands-on experience to drive change.

Moolya' s Vote of Confidence

Highlighting Our Capablities and Expertise

Thought Leadership

Moolya has always focussed on being a niche non-traditional test solutions company with a focus on value and its people.

• •
• Software Testing Luminary Award 2016
• •
• Red Herring Top 100 Companies in Asia 2013
• •
• 4.5 " Average Capterra Ratings on Product Innovation

Execution Leadership

10 years of powering all the top brands in India, Moolya has come a long way with a passion to back its claim with execution. Proof in the pudding.

• •
• 9 of the top 10 startups in India trusts Moolya with its testing
• •
• 1.2b users use and rely on the products we test and support
• •
• Superior Delivery Model with a solid project governance structure & a test-savvy culture

Innovation Leadership

Being a cross-platform test tech company, innovation run in its DNA. From Indore to SF, Moolya incubates the most widely used products in the testing space. Some of them are

• •
• Bugasura -Everyone's Testing Assistant
• •
• Perfachhi -a Pre-Prod Performance Monitoring Tool for Apps
• •
• AppAchhi -Deep Testing Automation Platform

Value Across Stakeholders

How Moolya Delivers the Value that it's Proud of

PO & BA Value

SME and Impact Mapping of Risks help PO and BA working with Moolya to experience a new value from Testing.

CTO & VP Value

Moolya's automation and tool building capabilities help them get super fast feedback with every check-in of code.

PMO Value

Project Management is something Moolya has learnt the hard way but in a good way. We value structure and consistency in delivery

Biz Value

If Businesses don't make money -no amount of testing is useful. Moolya translates testing to tangible business value.

Innovation and Tech at Moolya

Visual testing and Feedback Tool

Bugasura

Bugasura helps UX, UI & QA Testers provide visual feedback to Dev and save everyone's time.

Speed up testing with automated screenshot & other crucial information

•

Improve test coverage by running parallel tests on different conditions & networks

•

Compare builds & learn which performed better to stay consistent on quality

•

Debugging made easier with logs and screenshots captured for each result
